question:
[Martha] called her son, [Mark], from upstairs so that he could eat lunch. [Mark] got his sister, [Brandi], so she could eat lunch as well. [Spencer] was having trouble with his divorce because he only got to see his daughter [Brandi] a few times a week [Michael] took his sister, [Brandi], to a baseball game. [Michael] likes to visit his sister. Her name is [Brandi]. [Brandi] and her uncle [George] went to the pet shop. [Brandi] saw a puppy that she loved, so [George] bought it for her. [Brandi] was always arguing with her mother's husband [Spencer].
Question: How is [George] related to [Martha]?
